title: CR_Anders
author: CR_Anders
content: Deposit using your favourite team’s bonus code and we’ll top up your balance with a 100% match bonus and if your team wins the World Cup, you’ll share in an extra bounty of $500!Quarter-finals begin Friday December 9!Login and select Bonus Programs from the Account menu in the upper right corner and enter your team’s unique code.Click ACTIVATE to activate your Deposit BonusMake a deposit via your Deposit page and receive a 100% match bonus + Bounty entryFull details and eligible codes here: https://promotions.coinroyale.com/world-cup-2022-is-down-to-the-final-8-teams/
